ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
1 cup chopped dill pickles, or more to taste
2 tablespoons pickle juice, or more to taste
1 pinch freshly ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "This was served at our Easter lunch and was devoured. Serve with chips or crackers."
ins: Stir cream cheese in a bowl with a wooden spoon until smooth. Stir in dill pickles, onion, pickle juice, dill weed, salt, and pepper until evenly distributed. Refrigerate before serving, at least 1 hour.
